+    """

+    """
+    assert P.shape == (3, 4)
+    determinant = np.linalg.det
+
+    # camera center
+    X = determinant([P[:, 1], P[:, 2], P[:, 3]])
+    Y = -determinant([P[:, 0], P[:, 2], P[:, 3]])
+    Z = determinant([P[:, 0], P[:, 1], P[:, 3]])
+    T = -determinant([P[:, 0], P[:, 1], P[:, 2]])
+
+    C_ = np.transpose(np.array([[X / T, Y / T, Z / T]]))
+    return C_
